name: Miko's Flipping Adventure
description:
Miko's Flipping Adventure gameplay genre is a endless running, where you can move through different tiers.

Go as far as possible in a level full of obstacles and collect light bulbs to get points.

The game is a semester project of Lapland University of Applied Sciences, made by four students.

You move character with: A (Left), D (Right), W(Jump).

The game ends if the guard catches the player, or the player hits an obstacle, or getsthrough the 2-minute game level.
